data.name: Global AI On Tour - Dhaka, Bangladesh
data.description: The Global AI On Tour in Dhaka Bangladesh on 19 September 2020 is a free event organized across the world by local communities that are passionate about artificial intelligence on Microsoft Azure.

relatedRecords.name: Global AI Bootcamp Singapore
relatedRecords.description: Planning an full day event with two tracks with most of the day filled with Hands on sessions on NLP, Chatbots and learning the state of the art in the world of Microsoft AI. These sessions will be conducted by Microsoft AI MVPs and Kaggle Masters/Experts.
